section.name: Code Review Improvements
section.completed: - Refactored `CostEstimator` to expose static pricing logic, eliminating duplication in `ConsultOrchestrator`. - Created `src/utils/ConfigPaths.ts` to centralize configuration paths. - Updated `CostGate.ts` to use `ConfigPaths` and implemented ATOMIC file writing (write to tmp + rename) to prevent config corruption. - Updated `ConfigCascade.ts` to use `ConfigPaths`. - Fixed `ConsultationResult` type definition discrepancies between `src/types/index.ts` and `src/types/consult.ts` (removed duplicates from index, exported * from consult). - Added missing `TokenEfficiencyStats` and `ConsultOrchestratorOptions` to `src/types/consult.ts`. - Fixed `duration_ms` vs `durationMs` property usage in `src/commands/consult-stats.ts`. - Verified all tests pass (24 suites, 168 tests).
